Create Cases

Poderopedia, besides creating People profiles, Business profiles and Organizations profiles, allows the creation of articles. We will call these articles cases.

1. - To create a case you have to go to the Create menu (Fig. 43) and select the Create Case.

(Fig. 43)


3.-A new page will be displayed (Fig. 44). With the add buttonyou will be able to create a new case. In the grid will appear the Cases that have already entered, where you can: View, Edit Delete

(Fig. 44)

















4. - When creating a new case the required form will be displayed (Fig. 45). You have to complete the required information and Save (Submit):

(Fig. 45)
